headline: M&T Bank Recognized for Its Commitment to Serving Small-Business and Middle-Market Customers
summary: M&T Bank (NYSE:MTB) has been recognized by Crisil Coalition Greenwich as a top bank for its commitment to serving small-business and middle-market customers.
